subject: Vam pro
description_text:
Hi,

First of all i like your products!
One of my motors have a really bad  knocking sound.
The other motor is still fine.

Please help me.

Kind regards,

Michael van Eerdt

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael van Eerdt,  Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and shipping address, and we can send you a replacement VAM Pro. You may also open the top and check whether the internal spring or washer has shifted.

Hi,  First of all thank you for sorting this out, my ordernr is SSN1569 . Please send me a replacement to the adress below.  Michael van Eerdt Muntmeester 152 5406BH Uden   Netherlands  0031641302425  Kind regards,  Michael van Eerdt
Hi Michael van Eerdt,    This is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047065238382
